column5: Ks Haus is chic and comfortable! Private entrance and country porch with swing and rockers. Claw foot tub with shower surround. High ceilings, original flooring and wood walls lovingly restored. Lavish upscale accommodations. Supreme comfortable beds, fabulous Southwest decor, antiques and designer linens and towels.   Hostess is next door to accommodate your personal needs during your stay.
column8: Ks Haus is a two-room suite in a private farmhouse
